Test Name: Estradiol Free, Serum (includes Estradiol and SHBG)
Purpose: To accurately measure free estradiol, total estradiol, and SHBG levels in serum for hormonal assessment.
Container: Serum Separator Tube (SST) or plain red-top tube
Equipment: Automated immunoassay analyzer (e.g., Roche Cobas e411)
